::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus nods, a smile playing across his lips as he looks at Ominous. 
He knew why Ominous didn't touch him. Zardus had occationally fought 
the Energonian in the past, and getting energy sucked out of one's 
self wasn't the greatest feeling in the world.

"Yes, the war has raged on though," he answers Ominous, nodding at 
Akron at the introduction.

"This is DevilDuer," Zardus says, gesturing toward the smaller bot 
who was sitting at one of the far chairs.

"So," Zardus leans forward, looking at Ominous. He might as well cut 
to the chase, "What brings you here?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Ominous takes his seat, as dose Akron. The moment was here, 
arrived 
> finally. It was now or never, if this meeting fell through, then 
Ominous was 
> going to have problems.
>        "Sir, are you positive he can be trusted?" Akron, ever 
suspicious, 
> asked letting her pink eyes flutter a bit. 
>        Ominous nodded as Zardus entered. He got up and smiled at 
the 
> Commander, making sure not to touch him in fear he might absorb 
some of 
> Zardus' energy. That wouldnt make a good start.
>        "Ah, Zardus. Its been a long while, truly." He said. "This 
is Akron, 
> she has come with me for this meeting."
